nodes.text: A sabacc parlor was an establishment dedicated to sabacc playing. Often sabacc parlors were frequented by gamblers and criminals, and large amounts of credits and other commodities (including valuable information) were at stake.

One such parlor was The Spyder on Coruscant, which was frequented by Black Sun operatives as well as criminals like Kaa'to Leeachos. Other examples of sabacc parlors were The Even Cut and Juri's Sabacc Parlor.
